text: @afneil So Prof Newton said it's now #coronavirus testing CAPACITY not number of tests. This despite @michaelgove saying on #marr, Sunday 19th, it was 100k tests. 4 days ago. How times change. The Chocolate Fireguard Brigade are in charge. Good reason to stay #lockdownuk.
